item.text: Therefore we must be wary that, while the promise of entering his rest remains open, none of you may seem to have come short of it.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2097">good news proclaimed</st> to us <st data-num="2509">just as</st> <st data-num="2548" class="">they</st> did. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> they <st data-num="189" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="5623">did</st> them <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">good</st>, since <st data-num="2548" class="">they</st> <st data-num="4786" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> join in<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4786" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it in <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.<n id="2" />
For we who have believed enter that rest, as he has said, “As I swore in my anger, ‘They will never enter my rest!’” And yet God’s works were accomplished from the foundation of the world.
For he has spoken somewhere about the seventh day in this way: “And God rested on the seventh day from all his works,”
but to repeat the text cited earlier: “They will never enter my rest!”

<st data-num="3767">Therefore</st> it <st data-num="620" class="">remains</st> for <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846">it</st>, yet those to whom it was <st data-num="4387">previously</st> <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaimed</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="543" class="">disobedience</st>.
So God again ordains a certain day, “Today,” speaking through David after so long a time, as in the words quoted before, “Oh, that today you would listen as he speaks! Do not harden your hearts.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Joshua</st> had <st data-num="2664" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2664" class="">rest</st>, God<n id="1" /> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="3326 3778">afterward</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.

<st data-num="686" class="">Consequently</st> a <st data-num="4520">Sabbath rest</st> <st data-num="620" class="">remains</st> for the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one who <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st> <st data-num="846" class="">God’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2663" class="">rest</st> has <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2664" class="">rested</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2041">works</st>, <st data-num="5618">just as</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> did <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">his own</st> works.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Thus</st> we must make <st data-num="4704">every effort</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="2663" class="">rest</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> may <st data-num="4098" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="1722">by</st> following the <st data-num="846">same</st> <st data-num="5262">pattern</st> of <st data-num="543" class="">disobedience</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1756" class="">active</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5114" class="">sharper</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">any</st> <st data-num="1366" class="">double-edged</st> <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st>, <st data-num="1338" class="">piercing</st> <st data-num="891" class="">even to the point of</st> <st data-num="3311" class="">dividing</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st> from <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="5037">and</st> <st data-num="719" class="">joints</st> from <st data-num="3452" class="">marrow;</st> it is <st data-num="2924">able to judge</st> the <st data-num="1761" class="">desires</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1771" class="">thoughts</st> of the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.
And no creature is hidden from God, but everything is naked and exposed to the eyes of him to whom we must render an account.
Therefore since we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast to our confession.

<st data-num="1063">For</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="749" class="">high priest</st> <st data-num="3361 1410">incapable</st> of <st data-num="4834" class="">sympathizing</st> with <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weaknesses</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> one who has been <st data-num="3985" class="">tempted</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st> <st data-num="2596 3665">just as</st> we are, yet <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.
Therefore let us confidently approach the throne of grace to receive mercy and find grace whenever we need help.
